attributes.action: Pressure Burma [Mayanmar] to release Aung San Suu Kyi
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Aung San Suu Kyi- the leader of the Democratic party in Burma has been unfairly arrested and the British government should immediately pressure the Burmese Junta to release her, unconditionally.

rejection.details: The PM has already released a statement calling on Burma to release Aung San Suu Kyi http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19298
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
